title: Issue milestones

milestone.title: Issues
milestone.description: Fetching and processing issues, showing them on project pages and dashboards

body:
Unfortunately, issue milestones are not updated via webhooks:

1) adding, modifying,deleting milestones will not trigger an event to notify us
2) adding or modifying issue milestones will not trigger an event to notify us

Possible solutions:

1) Fetch milestones once a day
2) Add refresh milestones button on project page

title: Associations issues in Doctrine entities
body:
- [ ] The association DevBoard\Core\Project\Entity\Project#user refers to the inverse side field NullDev\UserBundle\Entity\User#projects which does not exist.
- [ ] The association DevBoard\Core\Project\Entity\Project#githubRepos refers to the inverse side field DevBoard\Github\Repo\Entity\GithubRepo#repos which does not exist.


- [ ] The mappings DevBoard\Github\Repo\Entity\GithubRepo#projects and DevBoard\Core\Project\Entity\Project#githubRepos are inconsistent with each other.

- [ ] The association DevBoard\Github\Branch\Entity\GithubBranch#lastCommit refers to the inverse side field DevBoard\Github\Commit\Entity\GithubCommit#commits which does not exist.

---

- [ ] The mappings DevBoard\Github\Commit\Entity\GithubCommit#commitStatuses and DevBoard\Github\CommitStatus\Entity\GithubCommitStatus#githubCommit are inconsistent with each other.
- [ ] The association DevBoard\Github\Commit\Entity\GithubCommit#githubRepo refers to the inverse side field DevBoard\Github\Repo\Entity\GithubRepo#commits which does not exist.
- [ ] The association DevBoard\Github\Commit\Entity\GithubCommit#author refers to the inverse side field DevBoard\Github\User\Entity\GithubUser#authored which does not exist.
- [ ] The association DevBoard\Github\Commit\Entity\GithubCommit#committer refers to the inverse side field DevBoard\Github\User\Entity\GithubUser#committed which does not exist.

---


- [ ] The association DevBoard\Github\Tag\Entity\GithubTag#repo refers to the inverse side field DevBoard\Github\Repo\Entity\GithubRepo#tages which does not exist.
- [ ] The association DevBoard\Github\Tag\Entity\GithubTag#lastCommit refers to the inverse side field DevBoard\Github\Commit\Entity\GithubCommit#commits which does not exist.

---

- [ ] The association DevBoard\Github\PullRequest\Entity\GithubPullRequest#repo refers to the inverse side field DevBoard\Github\Repo\Entity\GithubRepo#pullRequestes which does not exist.
- [ ] The association DevBoard\Github\PullRequest\Entity\GithubPullRequest#createdBy refers to the inverse side field DevBoard\Github\User\Entity\GithubUser#pullRequestsCreated which does not exist.
- [ ] The association DevBoard\Github\PullRequest\Entity\GithubPullRequest#assignedTo refers to the inverse side field DevBoard\Github\User\Entity\GithubUser#pullRequestsAssigned which does not exist.
- [ ] The association DevBoard\Github\PullRequest\Entity\GithubPullRequest#lastCommit refers to the inverse side field DevBoard\Github\Commit\Entity\GithubCommit#commits which does not exist.

---




- [ ] The association DevBoard\Github\CommitStatus\Entity\GithubCommitStatus#githubCommit refers to the inverse side field DevBoard\Github\Commit\Entity\GithubCommit#statuses which does not exist.
- [ ] The association DevBoard\Github\CommitStatus\Entity\GithubCommitStatus#githubExternalService refers to the inverse side field DevBoard\Github\ExternalService\Entity\GithubExternalService#statuses which does not exist.
